thread.title: Tishman Speyer Inks Deal With Pfizer and Wins $1.8 Billion Construction Loan

author: Keiko Morris
title: Tishman Speyer Inks Deal With Pfizer and Wins $1.8 Billion Construction Loan

organizations.name: billion construction loan developer tishman speyer

text:
Developer Tishman Speyer has closed a large lease deal with pharmaceutical company Pfizer Inc. at its Hudson Yards tower and has secured financing to move ahead with the $3.7 billion project, Tishman said.
Pfizer has signed a 20-year lease to take 15 floors at the Spiral, a 65-story skyscraper featuring cascading terraces.
